Package org.springframework.test.web.servlet.assertj

@NullMarked package org.springframework.test.web.servlet.assertj
AssertJ support for MockMvc.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.springframework.test.web.servlet
    Contains server-side support for testing Spring MVC applications.
    org.springframework.test.web.servlet.client
    Support for testing Spring MVC applications via RestTestClient with MockMvc for server request handling.
    org.springframework.test.web.servlet.htmlunit
    Server-side support for testing Spring MVC applications with MockMvc and HtmlUnit.
    org.springframework.test.web.servlet.request
    Contains built-in RequestBuilder implementations.
    org.springframework.test.web.servlet.result
    Contains built-in ResultMatcher and ResultHandler implementations.
    org.springframework.test.web.servlet.setup
    Contains built-in MockMvcBuilder implementations.
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractHttpServletRequestAssert<SELF extends AbstractHttpServletRequestAssert<SELF,ACTUAL>, ACTUAL extends jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest>
    Base AssertJ assertions that can be applied to an HttpServletRequest.
    AbstractHttpServletResponseAssert<R extends jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, SELF extends AbstractHttpServletResponseAssert<R,SELF,ACTUAL>, ACTUAL>
    Base AssertJ assertions that can be applied to any object that provides an HttpServletResponse.
    AbstractMockHttpServletRequestAssert<SELF extends AbstractMockHttpServletRequestAssert<SELF>>
    AssertJ assertions that can be applied to MockHttpServletRequest.
    AbstractMockHttpServletResponseAssert<SELF extends AbstractMockHttpServletResponseAssert<SELF,ACTUAL>, ACTUAL>
    Extension of AbstractHttpServletResponseAssert for MockHttpServletResponse.
    CookieMapAssert
    AssertJ assertions that can be applied to cookies.
    HandlerResultAssert
    AssertJ assertions that can be applied to a handler or handler method.
    MockMvcTester
    MockMvcTester provides support for testing Spring MVC applications with MockMvc for server request handling using AssertJ.
    ModelAssert
    AssertJ assertions that can be applied to a model.
    MvcTestResult
    Provides the result of an executed request using MockMvcTester that is meant to be used with assertThat.
    MvcTestResultAssert
    AssertJ assertions that can be applied to MvcTestResult.
